trans-unit.source: Provides caching functionality for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 提供了针对 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> 的缓存功能。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> does not cache bitmap data automatically.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>不会自动缓存位图数据。

trans-unit.source: Using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CachedBitmap> can improve performance in scenarios where multiple operations (such as clipping an image or scaling) need to be performed on a single bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CachedBitmap>在多个操作 （如剪辑图像或缩放） 需要在单个位图上执行的情况下可以改善性能。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CachedBitmap> in code.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CachedBitmap>在代码中。

trans-unit.source: The source bitmap that is being cached.
trans-unit.target: 正在缓存的源位图。

trans-unit.source: Initialization options for the bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: 位图图像的初始化选项。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the bitmap is cached to memory.
trans-unit.target: 指定如何将位图缓存到内存。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CachedBitmap" /> that has the specified source, bitmap create options, and bitmap cache option.
trans-unit.target: 初始化拥有指定源、位图创建选项和位图缓存选项的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CachedBitmap" /> 的一个新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CachedBitmap> in code.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CachedBitmap>在代码中。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 当 <paramref name="source" /> 为 <see langword="null" /> 时发生。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CachedBitmap" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CachedBitmap" /> 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true." />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CachedBitmap" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CachedBitmap" /> 对象的可修改复本，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。
